author: wain13001
body: Never forget the 4 senators who were warned 2 weeks in advance about how bad Covid was really going to be before the news broke to the US public, and promptly dumped massive parts of their portfolio and invested in DuPont and Citrix.

author: Quelorel
body:
PLEASE RATE / ROAST MY SOON TO BE PORTFOLIO (IM NEW)

MSFT, NOW, CRM, DOCU, CRWD, WDAY, OKTA, TEAM, SPLK, AKAM, NICE, HUBS, CHKP, CTXS, FICO, CMPS, VEEVA, NVDA, GOOG, TWLO, HERS, SYK

I plan on keeping them (and invest more in them) from minimum 2yrs (If I keep it more then 2 I don't have to pay tax in Croatia) to 10 - 15yrs.

Also considering to research EV a little bit this year.

Let me know what you think!

Thanks!

author: ConstantAd6560
body:
Personally I don't have any shares, but from some people I've talked to, it seems like BB isn't valued properly at the moment since the margin as a software company is so much higher.

On the other hand my company recently transitioned from Blackberry work to Citrix secure hub, so who really knows

author: everyday_malakia
body:
Have been using them as a bank for years, just started trading with them. I wish I could use their active trading program but via web it needs Citrix (no thanks) and i can’t install on Mac. So I just use it to buy and sell, and look at data on TradingView. 

Might switch to thinkorswim for trading. I had my moment about 1/3 Schwab, 1/3 Robinhood, 1/3 Fidelity/WeBull/TDA to try out different platforms. But after today WeBull and Robinhood can fuck off.

author: Born_Platypus_6300
body: Can someone explain why Senator Kelly Loeffler, Georgia, is being blasted by the media for selling off millions and investing everything into CTXS? The stock has done terrible for years. If anything she lost a huge amount of money. I probably have no idea what I am talking about, I know she is a scumbag for other reasons, yet I dont understand why investing into CTXS is such a big deal. As soon as I heard that she got caught with inside tips, and I looked up which companies she dropped right away and which companies she bought, and I am so confused. She didnt make anything at all. Seriously. She lost tons of money. The ones she sold did well and the ones she bought tanked. I dont understand. So if anyone has some insight I am all ears.

author: Mandala-Man
body:
GUYS everyone thinks BB is a cell phone company. we all have to thank wsb for bring it to the forefront making us understand it’s potential. it is a software company concentrating in cyber security and automation 🚀🚀🚀 plus machine learning 💎💎💎 that is the future. i cannot believe the hedge funders didn’t see this. probably bc they were concentrating on bankrupting it. now, a lot of ppl are researching on BB. OUR CANADIAN BABY is sharing the platform with peers like citrix and VMWARE. these companies are already elite. think about it, they are in the high 100’s/share, and BB was left to the dogs... less than $10 a share. this is UNFAIR. WE HAVE TO BRING BB UP. WE WILL SEE BB TO $300 per SHARE. Let’s say 300... in 100 days. that is our motto. LETS DO IT! MY FELLOW SOLDIERS! LETS SHOW THE POWER OF THE RETAIL INVESTOR. it’s not like this company has no substance... IT DOES. LET US MAKE PPL SEE THE VALUE IN BB. If it wasn’t valuable then AMAZON AND BAIDU WOULDNT RECENTLY PARTNER. LETS THINK... LETS GO 💎🚀💎🚀💎🚀 $300/Share in 100 Days. That is our immediate goal, my fellow soldiers.

DEMO OF TECH[HERE](https://youtu.be/-9iggiTTbC8)
